Detailed Description

Class CBTMCMSettings This class provides the tools for setting states in local BT MCM. Users of this class have to implement mixin class MBTMCMSettingsCB.

Definition at line 119 of file bteng.h.

TBTSearchMode &  aSearchMode,
TDes &  aLocalName,
TBool &  aNameModifiedFlag 
) [static]

Getter for all BT MCM settings.

Parameters:
aPowerState Reference to boolean value where power state is updated.
aDiscoverabilityMode Reference to discoverability mode where current state is fetched.
aSearchMode Reference to search mode where current state is fetched.
aLocalName Reference to descriptor where local name is fetched.
aNameModifiedFlag Reference to boolean value where local name modification flag is updated.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if successful otherwise one of system wide error codes

static IMPORT_C TInt CBTMCMSettings::IsLocalNameModified ( TBool &  aStatus  )  [static]

Gets the status of Local name modification flag from Shared Data. Parameters:

Parameters:
aStatus EFalse = System default name only exists in MCM. ETrue = User has given a new local device name.
Returns:
TInt Error indicating the success of call.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTMCMSettings::SetLocalBTName ( const TDesC &  aName  ) 

Setter for local BT name. MCM then responds to remote name requests with this name. Parameters:

Parameters:
aName Reference to descriptor holding the BT name.
Returns:
TInt Error indicating the success of call.

static IMPORT_C TInt CBTMCMSettings::GetLocalBTName ( TDes &  aName  )  [static]

Getter for local BT name. This method reads the local name from Shared Data and returns it to user. If name is not found from Shared Data, then it is fetched from BT MCM. Parameters:

Parameters:
aName BT Name from Shared Data.
Returns:
TInt Error value from Shared Data call.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTMCMSettings::SetDiscoverabilityModeL ( TBTDiscoverabilityMode  aMode,
TInt  aTime = 0 
)

Opens L2CAP socket and sets Discoverability Mode for MCM according to the mapping table: 

 aMode                    | Page | Inquiry | Limited |
 =====================================================
 EDiscModeHidden          | OFF  | OFF     | N/A     |
 EDiscModeLimited         | ON   | ON      | ON      |
 EDiscModeGeneral         | ON   | ON      | OFF     |
 =====================================================
Parameters:
Parameters:
aMode Discoverability mode to be set to MCM and Shared Data.
aServer Boolean indicating if BT server has made the call (means that no session with BT server is enabled. Default value is EFalse --> server is not caller.
aTime time during which the phone remains in visible state (in microsends) only used with EBTDiscModeTemporary (otherwise ignored)
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

static IMPORT_C TInt CBTMCMSettings::GetDiscoverabilityMode ( TBTDiscoverabilityMode &  aMode  )  [static]

Gets Discoverability Mode setting from Shared Data and returns that setting via referenced parameter aMode. Parameters:

Parameters:
aMode Functions returns discoverability mode via this reference
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTMCMSettings::SetSearchMode ( TBTSearchMode  aMode  ) 

Setter for BT search mode. This setting is stored only on Shared Data. Search mode can be general or limited. Parameters:

Parameters:
aMode Search mode to be set to shared data.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

static IMPORT_C TInt CBTMCMSettings::GetSearchMode ( TBTSearchMode &  aMode  )  [static]

Getter for BT search mode. Function reads the setting from Shared Data. Search mode can be general or limited. Parameters:

Parameters:
aMode Search mode to be read from shared data and put into this reference.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTMCMSettings::SetPowerState ( TBool  aState  ) 

Setter for BT MCM power mode With this function power is turned on/off and BT services are enabled/disabled. Also if power is turned off and there are active baseband connections, those will be disconnected. Parameters:

Parameters:
aMode Power mode to be set.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

Parameters:
aMode Functions returns power mode via this reference
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.
